title: Founding Engineer
mission: As our Founding Engineer, you will help us move from prototype to production, building reliable core services and setting the engineering culture.

must: Experience building and owning production services
Proficiency in at least one backend language (e.g., Python, Go, TypeScript/Node)
Databases (SQL and/or NoSQL) and data modeling

responsibilities: Design, build, and operate core product services end-to-end
Set engineering practices (code reviews, testing, CI/CD, on-call, observability)
Collaborate with product/design to deliver customer value quickly and iteratively
Make pragmatic architecture decisions that balance speed and long-term health
Establish reliability, monitoring, and incident response norms
Ensure data, security, and privacy best practices
Mentor teammates and help define the engineering culture
